K12D0642_H0621:95b-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i shri n'a ma aashta sha ta kam/
K12D0642_H0621:95b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa /
K12D0642_H0621:96a-0: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag @96a *//
K12D0642_H0621:96a-2: shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-3: thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-5: mtshan rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-6: gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-7: gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-8: mtshan rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-9: 'jam dpal dpal gyi dam pa lags //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-10: bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-11: mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-12: sku gsung 'phrin las bsam mi khyab //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-13: de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi khyab; ;stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag nyid can //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-14: stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-15: stong pa nyid la lhag par mos //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-16: srid pa gsum po stong par ston //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-17: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-18: sa rnams kun gyi mchog tu gyur //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-19: sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-20: sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-21: ngan 'gro kun dang de bzhin du //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-22: mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-23: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-24: smra ba'i seng+ge mi yi mchog /
K12D0642_H0621:96a-25: dul zhing nyon mongs dgra rnams dang //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-26: sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'//
K12D0642_H0621:96a-27: sems can thams cad yongs su skyob //
K12D0642_H0621:96a-28: grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-0: ral pa mun dza brtul zhugs @96b can; ;tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-1: bgrang nor thogs shing phyag mkhar bsnams //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-2: dag cing dag pa rnams dang ldan //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-3: 'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga' bdag mdzad //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-6: bzhugs pa'i gdan khri padma lags //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-7: gtsang ma autpal sngon po bsnams //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-8: bsam dag zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-9: khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-10: khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas lags //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-11: rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing mnga' dbang brnyes //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-12: bden pa bzhi dag ston pa po //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-13: 'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'//
K12D0642_H0621:96b-14: khyod ni dbang phyug skye rgu'i bdag /
K12D0642_H0621:96b-15: khyod ni zhi ba'i sems can rnams //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-16: kun gyi mnga' bdag yon tan gtso //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-17: khyod ni khyu mchog skye rgu'i gtso //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-18: thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgongs //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-20: rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-21: 'od zer stong ldan nyi ma khyod //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-22: zla ba dang ni phur bu'ang khyod //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-23: rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang lags //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-24: dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-25: klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-26: de bzhin sde dpon skem byed lags //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-27: lha min dbang po thags bzang ris //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-28: mig dmar gza' lag pa sangs //
K12D0642_H0621:96b-29: spen pa dpa' bo lha kun lags //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-2: 'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-3: khyod ni 'jig rten gang zag mchog /
K12D0642_H0621:97a-5: ye shes can gyi dam mchog pa //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-6: dam pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-7: bdud kyi las kyis yongs mi brdzi //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-8: kha na ma tho mi mnga' zab //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-9: dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun tu grags //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-10: khyod ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-11: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog /
K12D0642_H0621:97a-12: blo gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-13: blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa lags //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-14: khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam shing //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-15: byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-16: rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-17: lus can kun gyi mchog tu gyur; ;yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-18: sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-19: khyod ni mjug ring gza' mchog lags //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-20: khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog /
K12D0642_H0621:97a-21: khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-22: sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso bo lags //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-23: ded dpon 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-24: mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-25: khyod ni nam mkha' sa chu bzhin //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-26: khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-27: khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
K12D0642_H0621:97a-28: sems can re ba kun rdzogs mdzad //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-0: 'byung po kun gyis phyag bgyis @97b pa; ;rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-1: 'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal pa //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-2: aom w'a kye dam na ma sv'a h'a /
K12D0642_H0621:97b-3: ji skad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-4: rig sngags bcas par 'dzin na ni //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-5: sdig gyur rnam dag rab tu thob //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-6: brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-7: skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-8: de 'dod bsam rgu yid bzhin du; ;gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-9: bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-10: mtshams med skal pa mnyam pa yi //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-11: las rnams mi bzad gang byas pa; ;de dag thams cad myur du 'byang //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-14: sems can dag pas dran byas na //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-16: blo dang ldan pas dran byas te //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-17: nges par gnas nas su klog pa //
K12D0642_H0621:97b-18: sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod na yang //
